extSlogan.message: The ultimate NZB file downloader addon

extSettingsTestButtonTesting.description: Test connection button text while testing

extSettingsResetWarningMessage.message:
All settings will be erased and reverted to the default values!
This will also delete all custom settings (NZB search engines and NZB download interception domains)!

extSettingsPremiumizeAdvert.message: Set up new premiumize.me account with 15 days bonus premium status with the following link:

extSettingsNZBInterceptionLink.description: NZB download interception settings link title

extPopupNoHistoryMessage.description: Popup window message if no historie is available

extPopupShowDebugLog.description: Popup window show debug log button text

extPopupShowDownloadHistory.description: Popup window show download history button text

extNZBGetNZBFile.description: Get NZB File text e.g. for button or menu

extChangeLogLoadingErrorMessage.message: Error: Unable to load change log!

extAboutSupport.message: For support please visit the NZBDonkey support forum on fileleechers.info or open an "issue" on GitHub.

extAboutCredits.message: The NZBDonkey makes use of the NZBlnk URI scheme and was inspired by the NZBMonkey, the reference implementation on how to handle a NZBlnk link.

editPopupTitle.description: Titel for Pop-up window with the editable information for title, password and category

editPopupMessage.description: Message for Pop-up window with the editable information for title, password and category
editPopupMessage.message: NZBDonkey has intercepted the download of the following NZB file:

editPopupSendToTarget.description: Button text for send to target button

categorySelectionNoCategory.description: Category selection name for no category

SettingsTargetSynologyUsernameDesc.message: This user needs to have sufficient rights to use the DownloadStation

SettingsTargetSynologyPortDesc.message: usually 5000 for http and 5001 for https connection

SettingsTargetSABnzbdAPIKeyDesc.message: if you want to use manual category selection you must provide the SABnzbd API Key

SettingsTargetPremiumizePINDesc.message: can be found on your premiumize.me account page

SettingsTargetPremiumizeIDDesc.message: can be found on your premiumize.me account page

SettingsTargetAdvancedSettingsDesc.message: These settings are only needed in special circumstances, e.g. if your server is behind a reverse proxy.

SettingsNZBTargetDownload.message: save to the browser's default download folder

SettingsNZBFileprocessingMetadataTitle.message: add the title meta tag to the NZB file

SettingsNZBFileprocessingMetadataPasswor.message: add the password meta tag to the NZB file

SettingsNZBFileprocessingMetadataCategor.message: add the category meta tag to the NZB file

SettingsNZBFileprocessingFilenameSpaces.message: convert all periods to spaces (NZB.file.name -> NZB file name)

SettingsNZBFileprocessingFilenamePeriods.message: convert all spaces to periods (NZB file name -> NZB.file.name)

SettingsNZBFileCompletenessSegmentCountD.message: NZB files with missing segments above this threshold will be rejected.

SettingsNZBFileCompletenessFileCountDesc.message: NZB files with missing files above this threshold will be rejected.

SettingsGeneralNotificationsSuccess.message: only show success and error messages

SettingsGeneralNZBlnkDesc.message: If activated, NZBDonkey will catch and handle left mouse clicks on a NZBlnk link.

SettingsGeneralNZBlnk.message: Catch left mous clicks on NZBlnk links

SettingsGeneralDebugModeDesc.message: If activated, NZBDonkey will issue debug information in the console.

SettingsDownloadSaveAsWarning.message: due to a bug in Chrome, silent download will only work if Chrome setting "Ask where to save each file before downloading" is disabled.

SettingsDownloadSaveAsDesc2.message: Leave disabled if the NZB files should be automatically and silently saved in the default download folder.

SettingsDownloadSaveAsDesc1.message: If activated, a "Save As..." dialog will appear to select the folder where the NZB file should be saved.

SettingsDownloadFolderWarning.message: Do not use an absolute path! Only enter a <u>relative path</u> within your browsers default download folder! Do not add leading or trailing backslashes!

SettingsDownloadFolderDesc.message:
Leave empty if you would like to save the NZB files directly in your browsers default download folder or enter the name of a subfolder within your browsers default download folder where you would like to save the NZB files.
The subfolder will be created if it does not yet exist.

SettingsDownloadFolder.message: Subfolder for saving the NZB files

SettingsDownloadCategorySubFoldersDesc.message:
The NZB files will be stored in a corresponding subfolder according to their category.
Requires the category function to be activated. The category subfolders are created if they do not yet exist.

SettingsCategoriesTypeManualTypeFromTarg.message:
This NZB file destination does not provide categories for manual category selection.
The manual category selection setting was therefore set to "Use custom categories".

This option only works with NZBGet or SABnzbd as NZB file destination.
Please set a supported NZB file destination first.
manual category selection only works with SABnzbd if the SABnzbd API Key is provided
Use the categories from the NZB file destination (only works with NZBGet and SABnzbd*)

SettingsCategoriesTypeManualDesc.message: A pop-up window will be presented for each NZB file to choose the category.

SettingsCategoriesTypeDefaultDesc.message: Enter the name of the default category to be used for all NZB files.

SettingsCategoriesTypeAutomaticFallbackD.message: Action to take if automatic assignment of the category fails.

SettingsCategoriesTypeAutomaticDesc3.message: The regex expressions will be tested in descending order and first match will be used as category. The search is case insensitive.

SettingsCategoriesTypeAutomaticDesc2.message: NZBDonkey will test the NZB title/filename for the regex expressions and if matched set the category to the corresponding category name.

SettingsCategoriesTypeAutomaticDesc1.message: Enter the name of the category and the corresponding regex expression for automatic categories.

SettingsSearchEnginesDefaultDesc.message: Search engines that are not to be used can be deactivated. The other settings cannot be changed.

SettingsSearchEnginesActiveDesc.message: enable if this NZB search engine shall be used.

SettingsSearchEnginesNameDesc.message: custom name for the search engine

SettingsSearchEnginesSearchURLDesc.message: URL to be called for the NZB file search. The search string has to be replaced with "%s".

SettingsSearchEnginesResponseTypeDesc.message: Type of response sent back from the search engine. Can be either a HTML page or a JSON object.

SettingsSearchEnginesJSONPathDesc.message: If response type is JSON, this is the JSON object path for the NZB file ID (divided by periods). Example: { results: [ { nzbid: 123456 }, ... ], ... } => "results.0.nzbid"

SettingsSearchEnginesRegexDesc.message: If response type is HTML, this is the regex expression to be used to search in the HTML search results page for the NZB file ID. The NZB file ID has to be in a capturing group "()".

SettingsSearchEnginesRegexGroupDesc.message: number of the capturing group in the regex expression that does contain the NZB file ID. Can be left blank if response typ is JSON.

SettingsSearchEnginesDownloadURLDesc.message: URL to be called for the NZB file download. The NZB file ID has to be replaced with "%s".

SettingsInterception.message: intercept the download of NZB files

SettingsInterceptionPrompt.message: show pop-up window to edit title and password information

SettingsInterceptionPromptDesc.message:
If enabled, a pop-up window will appear for each intercepted NZB file to check and edit the title and password information before sending it to the NZB file destination.
Otherwise, the NZB file will be sent directly to the NZB file destination. The name of the downloaded NZB file is used to determine the title and, if applicable, the password.

SettingsInterceptionDefaultDomainsDesc.message:
Default domains where the download of NZB file will be intercepted.
Domains that are not to be used can be deactivated. The other settings cannot be changed.

SettingsInterceptionCustomDomainsDesc.message: Set up custom domains where the download of NZB files is intercepted.

SettingsInterceptionActiveDesc.message: enable if NZB file downloads shall be intercepted on this domain

SettingsInterceptionDomainDesc.message: base domain where you want to intercept NZB file download. CAUTION: only add the base domain without any subdomain (e.g. without "www").

SettingsInterceptionFormDataHandlingDesc.message:
defines how POST form data should be handled for this domain.
If the default setting results in constant error messages about invalid or empty NZB files, choose one of the other options.

SettingsInterceptionFormDataHandlingPOST.message: Send form data as POST request (default)

SettingsInterceptionFormDataHandlingGET.message: Send form data as GET request

NotificationRightClickWrongStart.message: NZBDonkey was started with a right click but neither on a link nor on a text selection

NotificationNoSupportForCategories.message: This NZB file destination does not support categories.

NotificationSettingsNotLoaded.message: The settings could not be loaded.

NotificationStartingDownload.message: Saving NZB file "$NZBFILE$" in the download folder

StatusNZBFetched.message: NZB file fetched - processing the file

ErrorInvalidNZBlnkMissingHeader.message: the NZBlnk link is missing the header parameter

ErrorInvalidNZBlnkNoParameters.message: the NZBlnk link does not contain any parameter

ErrorNoNZBlnk.message: this is not a NZBlnk link

ErrorNoUsableNZBFound.message: no usable NZB file was found

ErrorWhileConnectinToTarget.message: An error occurred while connection to $TARGET$

ErrorWhilePushingToTarget.message: An error occurred while pushing the NZB file to $TARGET$

SuccessSavingNZBFile.message: The NZB file "$NZBFILE$" was successfully saved to the download folder!

ErrorSavingNZBFile.message: The NZB file "$NZBFILE$" could not be saved to the download folder!

DownloadCancelled.message: The saving of the NZB file "$NZBFILE$" was aborted!

DownloadPasswordSaveWarning.description: Warning of invalid characters in password
DownloadPasswordSaveWarning.message: The password contains invalid characters and was not included in the filename.

NZBFileNoFiles.message: NZB file does not contain any file information!

NZBFileIncomplete.message: This NZB file is incomplete with

ServerErrorCode.message: the server responded with erro code "$CODE$"
